meanings.definition: The act of frequenting or visiting a place regularly.
meanings.sent1: Her frequentation of the library helped her improve her grades.
meanings.sent2: The frequentation of the park increased after the new playground was built.
meanings.sent3: His frequentation of the ice cream shop made him the unofficial taste tester.
meanings.sent4: The frequentation of the gym became a daily ritual for him, like a pilgrimage to health.
meanings.sent5: The frequentation of the cafe created a cozy atmosphere filled with familiar faces.

meanings.definition: The people who frequent a particular place.
meanings.sent1: The frequentation at the local diner included regulars who knew each other by name.
meanings.sent2: The frequentation of the park consisted of families enjoying picnics and playing games.
meanings.sent3: The frequentation at the movie theater made it feel like a community gathering.
meanings.sent4: The frequentation of the beach was a mix of tourists and locals soaking up the sun.
meanings.sent5: The frequentation of the museum brought together art enthusiasts from all walks of life.
